overview: Adapted from a horror thread on Twitter by Jeropoint, it tells the story of a girl named Nadia whose life is at an end, because she will be the next person her father sacrifices to the devil. From the results of the sacrifice, in 2002 the mother died miserably. Ten years later, Yoga, Nadia's older sibling, has had the same unfortunate fate as her mother. Of all Nadia's remaining family members, ten years after Yoga died, will Nadia have a similar fate?
title: Di Ambang Kematian
